original_text: Then thy elders and thy judges shall come forth, and they shall measure unto the cities which are round about him that is slain:
korean_text: 너희의 장로들과 재판장들은 나가서 그 피살된 곳의 사방에 있는 성읍의 원근을 잴 것이요

sentences.original_text: Then thy elders and thy judges shall come forth,
and they shall measure unto the cities
